title: 04/01/2021 - HOUR 2 - Broncos, Giants, Watson
itunes:title: 04/01/2021 - HOUR 2 - Broncos, Giants, Watson
description:
Drew Lock's days in Denver are numbered

It's a prove it year for the New York Giants

Can the Texans trade Deshaun Watson now?


Guests: Brandon Weedon, Lance Zierlein
